copied from their presheafed space counter-part

nodes.body:
### PR summary [f8efa3c1c3](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14039/commits/f8efa3c1c3975ea6bbe7760adbb66b80d51bd703)

#### Import changes

No significant changes to the import graph

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ of_stalk_iso`
`++ app_invApp`
`++ app_inv_app'`
`++ instance (U : Opens X) : IsIso (H.invApp U) := by delta invApp; infer_instance`
`++ invApp`
`++ invApp_app`
`++ inv_invApp`
`++ inv_naturality`
`++ isoRestrict_hom_ofRestrict`
`++ isoRestrict_inv_ofRestrict`
`++ ofRestrict_invApp`
`++ stalk_iso`
`++ to_iso`
`+++ ofRestrict`
`-+++- isoRestrict`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

</details>
The PR is quite large, but since the content is mostly just copying and pasting, hopefully the size is okay.

> Where this needed for #12371?

`LocallyRingedSpace.IsOpenImmersion.to_iso` is used to golf the proof of `IsIso` instance. But `LocallyRingedSpace.IsOpenImmersion.to_iso` doesn't really dependent on everything in this PR, it can be extracted independently, this PR is for completeness sake.

:v: jjaassoonn can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9645438916/job/26599662366)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9645438916/job/26599663164)
The correct thing to do is to make `H` an instance argument and `f` be explicit. The approach in `PresheafedSpace.IsOpenImmersion` is bad.
My thought exactly, I will open another PR to address this
Can we get #14037 over the line before I open the said PR so that less merge conflict needs to be delt with
This approach has been adopted in the latest commit
I am not sure how to get all the expected attributes at once. You may try to add a line `attribute [simp] invApp_app_assoc`.

I am not sure if I understand the comment correctly, I did the following:
```
@[reassoc (attr := simp)] 
lemma foo := ….

attribute [elementwise] foo
```
This is called `opensFunctor` for Schemes as it is a functor between `Opens`.

```suggestion
/-- The functor `Opens X ⥤ Opens Y` associated with an open immersion `f : X ⟶ Y`. -/
```

```suggestion
abbrev opensFunctor : Opens X ⥤ Opens Y :=
```

```suggestion
abbrev opensFunctor {X Y : LocallyRingedSpace} (f : X ⟶ Y)
    [H : LocallyRingedSpace.IsOpenImmersion f] : Opens X ⥤ Opens Y :=
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Geometry/OpenImmersion): lemmas for sheafed space/locally ringed space
